amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funding for UNESCO World Heritage and Man and Biosphere programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Mr. Serrano demanded a separate vote on the Coburn amendment (A015).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 202 (Roll no. 188).
